Parameters: Bundle: This value may be null.
LocaleList: ordered list of locale preferences that may be used to disambiguate the provided text. If no locale preferences exist, set this to null or an empty locale list. This value may be null.
TextClassifier.EntityConfig: This value may be null.
setEntityConfig(android.view.textclassif.Description: Sets the entity configuration to use. This determines what types of entities the TextClassifier will look for. Set to null for the default entity config and teh TextClassifier will automatically determine what links to generate.

Returns: This value will never be null.
build().Description: Builds and returns the request object.

Parameters: CharSequence: This value must never be null.

ClassDesc: A builder for building TextLinks requests.
